alert.note: Alert for Eastern Columbia; Eastern Rensselaer; Western Albany; Western Schenectady (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 10 at 3:18AM EST until December 11 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 1 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...The Berkshires of western Massachusetts and the northern and central Taconics and Helderbergs of eastern New York. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 1 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute on Monday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain will change to a heavy, wet snow late tonight and continue through Monday early afternoon. The snow may be falling heavy around the time of the morning commute, making for hazardous travel.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Columbia; Eastern Rensselaer; Western Albany; Western Schenectady
